name: Castle Defender (itch) (Lachlan Brown)
description:
Castle Defender tasks you with defending a castle from approaching waves of robotic enemies. Purchase upgrades between waves to give you the upper hand as the waves become larger and more powerful. Move between different view angles in your tower to shoot at enemies wherever they appear. Play on any of 4 difficulty options. Will you be the first to beat wave 5 on impossible? Find out for yourself by playing Castle Defender!

This is a student project made over the course of a month, with the requirement of making a game that was capable of being played on webpages, PC computers, and Android mobile devices.
